sources.name: Our World In Data – World Population by Fertility dataset
sources.description:
Data published by This dataset was calculated by Max Roser using data from the UN Population Division, Gapminder.org, and Childmortality.org
Data publisher's source Estimates are aggregated on the country level. Country level information is taken from the sources below. Alternatively it would be interesting to aggregate by the population of women in reproductive age; as this data is not available prior to 1950 this is approximated by the total population.
Calculated 11/08/2016
Link 

 

Population by country data comes from the following sources:

Before 1950: From Gapminder.org

1950-2015: UN Population Division (2015 Revision)

2016 onwards: Medium Variant – UN Population Division (2015 Revision)

Fertility by country data comes from the following sources:

Before 1950: From Gapminder.org

1950-2015: UN Population Division (2015 Revision)

2016 onwards: Medium Variant – UN Population Division (2015 Revision)
